column4: gaaaah, I'm angry now, don't fix stuff that isn't broke: thought I'd install flash 10 so I removed flashplugin-nonfree and installed adobe-flashplugin from their site, but now firefox doesn't detect it and it displays a white screen in konqueror 3.5.10
in addition, flash 10 does not appear as a plugin at all in firefox
no matter what I do, I can't get firefox to detect the plugin
hmm... check it's in the right directory for firefox
I had a similar problem that was fixed by fixing the directory problem
It put the files in the wrong place. I think I just copied them over to where the plugins that firefox did recognise where
so do about:plugins, see what it does find
and out the flash 10 stuff in there with it
you are putting this in the url box in firefox right?
fine.. so work out where those are
it'll also be in a plugins directory..just find all the directories called plugins
